sentences.sContent: The phenomenon of gerontocracy has existed for millennia because the young are accustomed to following the aged.
sentences.sContent_eng: The phenomenon of gerontocracy has existed for millennia because the young are accustomed to following the aged.
sentences.sCn: 因为年轻人习惯于跟从老年人，所以老年政权现象得以存在了几个世纪的时间。

remMethod.val: geront(老人) + o + cracy(统治) → 老人统治的政府

words.tran: 老年医学；老年病学；老人学
